description.value: Not everyone is reincarnated, and you feel a strong connection with the spiritual echoes of those who didn't receive the same opportunity as you. You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Talking Corpse] as an occult innate spell that you can cast once per day. You can ask a fourth question of a corpse when you cast this spell. The corpse attempts its @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|traits:occult,spell] save against your spell DC or your class DC, whichever is higher.

publication.title: Pathfinder #199: To Bloom Below the Web
